items.sentence: Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t going to go to Boston with John.
Tom knows there\'s no way he can do that without some help.
Tom had to pay a fine because he parked in the wrong place.
I certainly had no idea Tom was planning to move to Boston.
I could hear someone calling my name on the noisy platform.
I could never afford to buy the kind of house Tom lives in.
I didn\'t know Tom wanted to learn how to play the trumpet.
Tickets are $30 per person and must be purchased by Monday.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to buy what he needed to buy.
Tom didn\'t know that he was adopted until he was thirteen.
